publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1179 Mr Frank McAveety: Congratulations to Saint Mungo’s Academy—That the Parliament recognises the contribution that Saint Mungo’s Academy has made to education in Glasgow, both at its original location at Townhead and in the east end where it has provided excellent education for more than a century; praises its record of achievement in school debating, finding post-school employment for students and for its innovative work with campus police officers and Strathclyde Police, and congratulates Saint Mungo’s Academy on its 150th anniversary and wishes all present and future staff and students future success. Supported by: Bashir Ahmad*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Bob Doris*, Karen Gillon*, Patrick Harvie*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Butler*, Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Trish Godman*, Karen Whitefield*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-1179 Congratulations to Saint Mungo’s Academy (lodged on 18 January 2008) Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Curran*
S3M-1179 Congratulations to Saint Mungo’s Academy (lodged on 18 January 2008) Michael McMahon*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Robert Brown*, Kenneth Gibson*, Des McNulty*
S3M-1179 Congratulations to Saint Mungo’s Academy (lodged on 18 January 2008) George Foulkes*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-1179 Congratulations to Saint Mungo’s Academy (lodged on 18 January 2008) Patricia Ferguson*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-1179 Congratulations to Saint Mungo’s Academy (lodged on 18 January 2008) Jack McConnell*
